channel.title: Midi Clock Active Outlet
channel.description:
Hey the "active" outlet of the midi/in/clock object is not really working when the clock is already running before starting the patch.
You always need to restart the sequencer wich is quite annoying for jam situations.

item.title: Midi Clock Active Outlet
item.dc:creator: @Blindsmyth Simon

@Blindsmyth wrote:

Hey the "active" outlet of the midi/in/clock object is not really working when the clock is already running before starting the patch.
